page.description: Used to select the date and/or time.

description.p: The Date/Time Editor displays "spinner" controls for specifying a date (Year - Month - Day of month) or a date and time (Year - Month - Day of month Hour : Minute). You can "spin" the columns by sliding your finger up or down on the column. There is a "Today" (for Date) or "Now" (for Date/Time) button to set the current day or date and time.
